name: n8n-nodes-educational-template
description: Educational template for creating custom n8n nodes

scripts.build: echo 'Build: Creating dist directory and copying files' && mkdir -p dist/nodes dist/credentials && echo 'Build complete - ready for development'
scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode - add your nodes to /nodes directory and run build'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting: No nodes to lint yet - add your TypeScript nodes and configure eslint'
scripts.test: echo 'No tests configured - add your tests to test/ directory'
scripts.test:watch: echo 'Test watch mode - configure jest for your tests'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint
